channel.title: Html5 on Tristan's website
channel.description: Recent content in Html5 on Tristan's website

item.title: Sunday Data/Statistics Link Roundup (11/18/12)
item.description: An interview with Brad Efron about scientific writing. I haven’t watched the whole interview, but I do know that Efron is one of my favorite writers among statisticians. Slidify, another approach for making HTML5 slides directly from R. I love the idea of making HTML slides, I would definitely do this regularly. But there are a couple of issues I feel still aren’t resolved: (1) It is still just a little too hard to change the theme/feel of the slides in my opinion.
